page.title: 15A Wild Flower Hunt.
page.content: At the end of June we went on a wild flower hunt around school. I saw 8 different kinds of flowers altogether. On the school field and lawn I saw{ {creeping buttercup}and{common daisy.} On the cart-track down to the allotments I saw{common chickweed, {shepherd's purse, scented mayweed, {pineappleweed}and{cow parsley.}There was lots of{cow parsley.} At the edge of the playground I saw some{groundsel.} Three weeks later we saw that the{cow {parsley}flowers had died, but we saw some different flowers. By the cart-track we saw some{rosebay {willowherb, foxgloves, hedge mustard} and{Oxford ragwort.}By the side of the playground we saw some{spear thistles} growing.
